reviewText: Wonderful footage of Anno Sensei, a direct student of Osensei, and his American students and now prominent teachers in their own right - Mary Heiny Sensei, Linda Holiday Sensei and Jack Wada Sensei.  There is concurrent translation and nice variation of real time and slow motion movement.  I use this dvd extensively in teaching at my dojo.  Penny Sablove, Chief Instructor, Heart of San Francisco Aikido
